text: innum, pumiyil arukaruke inaintarpol pala pakutikalai (amaittu, avarril) tiratcait tottankalaiyum, vilainilankalaiyum, kilaikal ullatum, kilaikal illatatumana periccai (varkkattai)yum (avane untakkinan; ivaiyanaittirkum) ore tannir kontu tan payccappattalum, avarril cilavarrai veru cilavarrai vita cuvaiyil nam menmaiyakkiyirukkinrom; niccayamaka ivarril unarntariyum makkalukku pala attatacikal irukkinrana
